Title: Spitfire
Description:
We've tended these orchards and made cider from their nectar for generations. In that time, we've learned a special trick for putting out fires in a pinch.

<Hanae pushes a jug of cider into your hand.>

The cider itself - when mixed with crushed gingerleaf and saliva - quickly becomes sticky and viscous. Perfect for smothering flames.

Please, while you're out there, try to get the flames under control. I've already mixed in the gingerleaf, just swig and spit.
ObjectivesText: Use the Nectarbreeze Cider to put out 12 fires around Nectarbreeze Orchard.
CompletionText: Best not to judge our prized cider by its flavor in this state.
RewardText:
A survivor came in moments ago and said the flames are beginning to die down.

We owe our very way of life to you, stranger. I cannot possibly reward you adequately, but please take this.
